snippet.title: NES Longplay [551] Rainbow Islands: The Story of Bubble Bobble II (US)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Lemmy556

USA/Japan version of NES Rainbow islands which is completely different from the European version.

Compared to the Mastersystem version there seems to be more powerup item drops from enemies. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
